title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Percentage of newly installed capacity and Netherlands has the lowest Percentage of newly installed capacity.
The second highest Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the Country US.
Country Netherlands has 45.0 times less Percentage of newly installed capacity than Country China which is the highest.
Country China is higher than any other Countrys with value 45.0, followed by US, and US. Down to Country Netherlands with the lowest value 1.0.
Similar Percentage of newly installed capacity is found in Country India, and US.
The Country Netherlands tends to be 5.06 percent lower than average.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is 89.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
